TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNamespaceManager extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver
Public Class XmlNamespaceManager Implements IEnumerable, IXmlNamespaceResolver
public ref class XmlNamespaceManager : System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver
type XmlNamespaceManager = class interface IXmlNamespaceResolver interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 解析集合的命名空间、向集合添加命名空间和从集合中移除命名空间，以及提供对这些命名空间的范围管理。

span.span: Resolves, adds, and removes namespaces to a collection and provides scope management for these namespaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何声明和 XML 文档中使用命名空间的常规信息，请参阅[管理 XML 文档中的命名空间](~/docs/standard/data/xml/managing-namespaces-in-an-xml-document.md)。For general information about how namespaces are declared and used in XML documents, see [Managing Namespaces in an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/managing-namespaces-in-an-xml-document.md). 将前缀和命名空间存储为字符串。 stores prefixes and namespaces as strings. 下面是一个可以使用此类执行的管理和查找任务的摘要。Here's a summary of management and lookup tasks you can perform with this class. 有关更多信息和示例，请遵循指向每个方法或属性的引用页的链接。For more information and examples, follow the links to the reference page for each method or property. |功能To|使用Use| |--------|---------| |添加命名空间Add a namespace| 方法 method| |移除命名空间Remove a namespace| 方法 method| |查找默认命名空间的 URIFind the URI for the default namespace| 属性 property| |查找命名空间前缀的 URIFind the URI for a namespace prefix| 方法 method| |查找命名空间 URI 的前缀Find the prefix for a namespace URI| 方法 method| |获取当前节点中命名空间的列表Get a list of namespaces in the current node| 方法 method| |限定命名空间的范围Scope a namespace| 和 方法 and methods| |检查是否在当前范围内定义了前缀Check whether a prefix is defined in the current scope| 方法 method| |获取用于查找前缀和 URI 的名称表Get the name table used to look up prefixes and URIs| 属性 property| 若要将命名空间添加到命名空间管理器中，创建对象，然后使用方法。To add namespaces to the namespace manager, you create a object and then use the method. 创建时默认前缀和命名空间对自动添加到命名空间管理器。Default prefix and namespace pairs are automatically added to the namespace manager on creation. 当您创建命名空间管理器时，可以指定从名称表， ，或类，以及如何将方法来添加命名空间。When you create the namespace manager, you can specify a name table from the , , or class, and then use the method to add the namespaces. 你可以提供对象作为参数或方法的类来执行引用命名空间限定元素和属性名称的 XPath 查询表达式。You can supply the object as a parameter to the or method of the class to execute XPath query expressions that reference namespace-qualified element and attribute names. 命名空间管理器假定前缀和命名空间已经过验证并符合[W3C 命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)规范。The namespace manager assumes that prefixes and namespaces have already been verified and conform to the [W3C Namespaces](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) specification. 命名空间管理器不执行任何验证。The namespace manager does not perform any validation. 命名空间管理器将会原子化字符串时通过使用添加方法，并通过使用执行查找时或方法。The namespace manager atomizes the strings when they are added by using the method and when a lookup is performed by using the or method. 命名空间管理器除了添加和检索命名空间外，还实现枚举支持。The namespace manager implements enumeration support in addition to adding and retrieving namespaces. 可以通过使用在命名空间管理器中保存的信息通过循环`foreach`构造。You can loop through the information saved in the namespace manager by using the `foreach` construct. 例如，如果具有名称创建一个命名空间管理器`nsmanager`，你可以循环访问表使用`foreach (String prefix in nsmanager)`。For example, if you create a namespace manager with the name `nsmanager`, you can iterate through the table by using `foreach (String prefix in nsmanager)`. 由于命名空间管理器提供将前缀和命名空间作为对象的字符串比较功能，因此与字符串的直接比较相比，使用命名空间管理器可以提高性能。Because the namespace manager provides a string comparison with the prefix and namespaces as objects, there is a performance improvement when using the namespace manager over the direct comparison of a string. 下面的代码示例演示如何将前缀绑定`xsd`与命名空间 URI 的并将其添加到命名空间管理器：The following code example shows how to bind the prefix `xsd` with the namespace URI of and add it to the namespace manager: ```vb nsmgr.AddNamespace("xsd", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema") ``` ```csharp nsmgr.AddNamespace("xsd", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"); ``` 然后，您可以找到该命名空间使用方法：You can then find the namespace by using the method: ```vb nsmgr.LookupNamespace("xsd") ``` ```csharp nsmgr.LookupNamespace("xsd"); ``` 下面的示例创建使用从 XML 读取器的名称表：The following example creates an by using the name table from an XML reader: ```vb Dim reader As New XmlTextReader("myfile.xml") Dim nsmanager As New XmlNamespaceManager(reader.NameTable) nsmanager.AddNamespace("msbooks", "www.microsoft.com/books") nsmanager.PushScope() nsmanager.AddNamespace("msstore", "www.microsoft.com/store") While reader.Read() Console.WriteLine("Reader Prefix:{0}", reader.Prefix) Console.WriteLine("XmlNamespaceManager Prefix:{0}", nsmanager.LookupPrefix(nsmanager.NameTable.Get(reader.NamespaceURI))) End While ``` ```csharp XmlTextReader reader = new XmlTextReader("myfile.xml"); XmlNamespaceManager nsmanager = new XmlNamespaceManager(reader.NameTable); nsmanager.AddNamespace("msbooks", "www.microsoft.com/books"); nsmanager.PushScope(); nsmanager.AddNamespace("msstore", "www.microsoft.com/store"); while (reader.Read()) { Console.WriteLine("Reader Prefix:{0}", reader.Prefix); Console.WriteLine("XmlNamespaceManager Prefix:{0}", nsmanager.LookupPrefix(nsmanager.NameTable.Get(reader.NamespaceURI))); } ```

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称表用于查找前缀和命名空间。The name table is used to look up prefixes and namespaces. 可以在构造函数中指定预原子化字符串与现有名称表。An existing name table with pre-atomized strings can be specified in the constructor. 在此过程中有几个优点。There are several advantages in doing so. 例如，如果名称表对象使用，每个读取的任何命名空间和前缀字符串推送到名称表后可以重新使用通过。For example, if the name table of an object is used, after each read, any namespace and prefix strings pushed into the name table can be re-used by . 有关原子化字符串的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on atomized strings, see . > [!NOTE] > 如果指定现有名称表，名称表中的任何命名空间不会自动添加到。If you specify an existing name table, any namespaces in the name table are not automatically added to . 必须使用和添加或删除命名空间。You must use and to add or remove namespaces. ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用读取器的名称表。The following example creates an using the name table of the reader. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.XmlNamespaceManager Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is passed to the constructor

abstract member AddNamespace : string * string -> unit override this.AddNamespace : string * string -> unit

param.name: prefix
param.span: 与要添加的命名空间关联的前缀。

span.span: The prefix to associate with the namespace being added.

param.span: 使用 String.Empty 来添加默认命名空间。

span.span: Use String.Empty to add a default namespace.

param.span: **注意**：如果 将用于解析 XML 路径语言 (XPath) 表达式中的命名空间，则必须指定前缀。

span.span: **Note**If the will be used for resolving namespaces in an XML Path Language (XPath) expression, a prefix must be specified.

param.span: 如果 XPath 表达式不包含前缀，则假定命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 为空命名空间。

span.span: If an XPath expression does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace.

param.span: 有关 XPath 表达式和 的更多信息，请参考 和 方法。

span.span: For more information about XPath expressions and the , refer to the and methods.
The namespace to add.

summary.span: 将给定的命名空间添加到集合。

span.span: Adds the given namespace to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会检查`prefix`和`uri`的一致性。 does not check `prefix` and `uri` for conformance. 检查名称，包括前缀和命名空间，以确保它们根据万维网联合会 (W3C) 的有效 XML 名称[命名空间规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)。 checks names, including prefixes and namespaces, to ensure they are valid XML names according to the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Namespaces specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/). 在内部使用，因此，若要避免重复工作，假定所有前缀和命名空间都都有效。 is used internally by , so to avoid a duplication of efforts, assumes all prefixes and namespaces are valid. 如果当前范围中已存在的前缀和命名空间，新前缀和命名空间对将替换现有的前缀/命名空间组合。If the prefix and namespace already exist within the current scope, the new prefix and namespace pair will replace the existing prefix/namespace combination. 相同的前缀和命名空间组合可以存在于不同的范围。The same prefix and namespace combination can exist across different scopes. 以下前缀/命名空间对添加到默认情况下。The following prefix/namespace pairs are added by default to the . 它们可以在任何范围确定。They can be determined at any scope. |前缀Prefix|命名空间Namespace| |------------|---------------| |xmlnsxmlns| （xmlns 前缀命名空间） (the xmlns prefix namespace)| |xmlxml| （XML 命名空间） (the XML namespace)| |String.EmptyString.Empty|String.Empty （空命名空间）。String.Empty (the empty namespace). 此值可以为重新分配一个不同的前缀。This value can be reassigned a different prefix. 例如，xmlns =""定义了默认命名空间为空命名空间For example, xmlns="" defines the default namespace to be the empty namespace| ## Examples 下面的示例使用若要解决的 XML 片段中的命名空间。The following example uses to resolve namespaces in an XML fragment. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.AddNamespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The value for is "xml" or "xmlns".
The value for or is .

summary.span: 返回一个枚举数，将使用该枚举数循环访问 集合中的命名空间。

span.span: Returns an enumerator to use to iterate through the namespaces in the .

returns.span: 一个 ，包含 存储的前缀。

span.span: An containing the prefixes stored by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的代码演示如何使用若要查看所有命名空间对存储于对象。The following code shows how to use the to view all the namespace pairs stored in the object. ```vb Dim nsEnum As IEnumerator = nsmgr.GetEnumerator() Do While nsEnum.MoveNext If nsEnum.Current <> "" Then MsgBox("xmlns:" + nsEnum.Current + "=" + nsmgr.LookupNamespace(nsEnum.Current)) End If Loop ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> GetNamespacesInScope (System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope scope);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> GetNamespacesInScope(valuetype System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope scope) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetNamespacesInScope (scope As XmlNamespaceScope) As IDictionary(Of String, String)
public: virtual System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ GetNamespacesInScope(System::Xml::XmlNamespaceScope scope);

abstract member GetNamespacesInScope : System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope -> System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string> override this.GetNamespacesInScope : System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope -> System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string>

param.name: scope
param.span: 一个枚举值，指定要返回的命名空间节点的类型。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the type of namespace nodes to return.

summary.span: 获取被前缀键控的可用于枚举当前范围内的命名空间的命名空间名称集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of namespace names keyed by prefix which can be used to enumerate the namespaces currently in scope.

returns.span: 当前作用域中的命名空间和前缀对的集合。

span.span: A collection of namespace and prefix pairs currently in scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典包含前缀作为关键字的命名空间名称的集合。The dictionary consists of a collection of namespace names keyed by prefix. 它可以用于枚举的范围内命名空间。It can be used to enumerate the in-scope namespaces. 字典是断开连接的命名空间列表的副本。The dictionary is a disconnected copy of the namespace list. 它保持当前范围内命名空间列表更改为不变。It remains unchanged as the current in-scope namespace list changes. 下表显示如何值会影响返回的命名空间方法。The following table shows how values affect the namespaces returned by the method. |XmlNamespaceScope valueXmlNamespaceScope value|xmlns:xmlxmlns:xml|xmlns:xmlnsxmlns:xmlns|xmlns=""xmlns=""| |-----------------------------|---------------|-----------------|---------------| |`All`|是Yes|NoNo|NoNo| |`ExcludeXml`|NoNo|NoNo|NoNo| |`Local`|NoNo|NoNo|是Yes|

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示所提供的前缀是否具有为当前推到的范围定义的命名空间。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the supplied prefix has a namespace defined for the current pushed scope.

returns.span: 如果定义有命名空间，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there is a namespace defined; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否存在空命名空间定义默认值，请设置`prefix`为 String.Empty。To determine whether there is a default empty namespace defined, set `prefix` to String.Empty. 返回值为`true`指示是当前作用域; 中定义的默认命名空间`false`指示没有默认命名空间定义。A return value of `true` indicates that there is a default namespace defined in the current scope; `false` indicates that no default namespace is defined. > [!NOTE] > xmlns:x =""是根据非法[W3C 命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)建议。xmlns:x= "" is illegal according to the [W3C Namespaces](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) recommendation. ## Examples 下面的示例显示默认命名空间，如果存在。The following example displays the default namespace, if one exists. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNamespaceManager.DefaultNamespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string LookupPrefix (string uri);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string LookupPrefix(string uri) cil managed
Public Overridable Function LookupPrefix (uri As String) As String
public: virtual System::String ^ LookupPrefix(System::String ^ uri);
abstract member LookupPrefix : string -> string override this.LookupPrefix : string -> string

param.name: uri
param.span: 要为前缀解析的命名空间。

span.span: The namespace to resolve for the prefix.

summary.span: 查找为给定的命名空间 URI 声明的前缀。

span.span: Finds the prefix declared for the given namespace URI.
The matching prefix.

returns.span: 如果没有映射的前缀，则方法返回 String.Empty。

span.span: If there is no mapped prefix, the method returns String.Empty.
If a null value is supplied, then is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过审核堆栈查找映射的前缀 （也就是说，看起来全局）。This method finds the mapped prefix by walking the stack (that is, it looks globally). 所提供的字符串必须要使查找成功的原子化。The supplied string must be atomized for the lookup to succeed. 换而言之，提供的字符串对象必须存在的命名空间管理器的名称表中 ()。In other words, the supplied string object must exist in the namespace manager's name table (). 返回的字符串也是原子化。The returned string is also atomized. 有关原子化字符串的更多信息，请参见 类。For more information on atomized strings, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法写入属性时。The following example shows how to use the method when writing an attribute. 它使用方法启动属性，查找的前缀`urn:samples`命名空间 URI，然后使用在该前缀编写时`ISBN`属性：It uses the method to start the attribute, looks up the prefix for the `urn:samples` namespace URI, and then uses that prefix in the when writing the `ISBN` attribute: ```vb Dim prefix As String = nsMgr.LookupPrefix("urn:samples") writer.WriteStartAttribute(prefix, "ISBN", "urn:samples") ``` ```csharp XmlNameTable nt = new XmlNameTable(); XmlNamespaceManager nsMgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nt); nsMgr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples");string prefix = writer nsMgr.LookupPrefix("urn:samples"); writer.WriteStartAttribute(prefix, "ISBN", "urn:samples"); ``` 下面的示例使用若要查找的元素上定义的前缀。The following example uses to find the prefix defined on an element. ```vb writer.WriteStartElement("root", "book") writer.WriteStartElement("x", "node", "author") s = writer.LookupPrefix("author") CError.Compare(s, "x", "Error in nested element") writer.WriteEndElement() s = writer.LookupPrefix("book") CError.Compare(s, Nothing, "Error in root element") writer.WriteEndElement() ``` **输出****Output** ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Xml.XmlNameTable NameTable { get; }

summary.span: 将命名空间范围弹出堆栈。

span.span: Pops a namespace scope off the stack.

returns.span: 如果堆栈上留有命名空间范围，则为 ；如果不再有要弹出的命名空间，则为 。

span.span: if there are namespace scopes left on the stack; if there are no more namespaces to pop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此方法中，已添加到其中的所有命名空间(通过调用) 自上次调用以来删除。When you call this method, all namespaces which were added to (by calling ) since the last call to are removed. ## Examples 以下示例将添加到前缀/命名空间对，然后显示所有对集合中。The following example adds prefix/namespace pairs to the and then displays all the pairs in the collection.
